about.text: Ankr provides decentralized staking services for Ethereum 2.0. Ankr's Eth2 staking protocol and platform combines staking and DeFi, implementing elements from traditional staking with non-custodial management, Micropools, instant liquidity and decentralized governance.
about.title: Ankr StakeFiInternet bond launchpad
about.subtitle: Connect your staking rewards with DeFi

text: To use Ankr StakeFi for Binance Smart Chain–pegged ETH you first need to add the Binance Smart Chain network to your MetaMask wallet by following these steps. If you have already added the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network, please go straight to step 4.
1. In your MetaMask, click the menu which is set to “Main Ethereum Network” by default. In the dropdown click “Custom RPC”.
2. A form will appear, where you need to fill in certain parameters to connect to the Binance Smart Chain network.

3. Fill in the following parameters:
Network name: Binance Smart Chain
New RPC URL: https://bsc-dataseed.binance.org
ChainID: 56
Symbol: BNB
Block Explorer: https://bscscan.com
4. Now switch in the menu from Mainnet Ethereum Network to Binance Smart Chain and you will see the default currency change from ETH to BNB.
5. Click Launch App button to connect your MetaMask account. You will automatically taken to the converter page.
about-smartchain.title: Binance Smart Chain

aeth-advantages.primary-text: aETHc allows you to stake Eth2 and redeem rewards before the phase 1.5 goes live and the lockup period ends (which can take up to several years!).
aeth-advantages.secondary-text: aETHc is listed on Uniswap for immediate liquidity. aETHc holders can also provide liquidity to the aETHc/ETH pair on the exchange platform and earn from transaction fees.
aeth-advantages.title: Instant liquidity

aeth-banner.text: Learn how aETHc works and how you can use it.
aeth-banner.title: How aETHc works?

services.bitkeep: Direct access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.curve: Decentralized liquidity pool for aETHc with double reward mechanism.
services.imtoken: Mobile access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.metamask: Store aETHc and connect with DeFi applications.
services.onto: Direct access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.onx: aETHc staking pools and yield strategies for collateralized assets.
services.snowswap: Incentivizing Eth2 adoption with aETHc swaps and pools.
services.sushiswap: Decentralized trading and incentivized aETHc liquidity pools.
services.trustwallet: Mobile access to Ankr's Eth2 staking services.
services.uniswap: Decentralized liquidity pools and trading for aETHc.

aeth-ecosystem.subtitle: Ecosystem
aeth-ecosystem.title: Access Ankr's Eth2 staking services and aETHc here

deposit.text: Deposit ETH on Staking Manager (you can deposit any amount starting from 0.5 ETH) by connecting your wallet to the Ankr StakeFi platform.
deposit.title: Deposit

get-aeth.text: Once your ETH is staked on the Beaconchain, your aETHc balance will be added to the Ankr StakeFi platform for you to redeem.
get-aeth.title: Get aETHc

redeem.text: As soon as Ethereum 2.0 transactions are activated, you can use your aETHc to redeem your staked ETH + staking rewards on the Ankr StakeFi platform.
redeem.title: Redeem your ETH + staking rewards

use-aeth.text: You can store aETHc in your wallet to keep full control of your funds. You can also trade aETHc or use it in DeFi products to earn yield. Please note that if you are trading aETHc, you are effectively trading your entire investment (both the invested amount and the expected reward).
use-aeth.title: Use aETHc

aeth-promo.text: aETHc is a synthetic derivative asset that enables instant liquidity for the Ethereum 2.0 network
aeth-promo.title: What is aETHc?

aeth-reward.primary-text: aETHc represents the staked ETH plus all future staking rewards.
aeth-reward.secondary-text: Initially, aETHc is issued at a ratio of 1:1 to the amount of ETH staked. Over time, 1 aETHc is expected to grow in ETH value, as it contains the principal stake plus staking rewards.
aeth-reward.title:
One asset.
Combined value.

aeth-start.text: aETHc is easily accessible and tradable on various DeFi platforms, with a growing number of yield earning opportunities. Start staking now and try it yourself!
aeth-start.title: New yield opportunities with aETHc

tip.aETH: With aETHc, rewards are built in to the token price, so as time passes, the token becomes more valuable. Once Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1.5 is released, you can redeem your aETHc for your original ETH plus accumulated rewards.
tip.fETH: This is always worth approximately 1 ETH, however by holding this token you can receive continual rewards, paid in additional aETHb, meaning your rewards are compounded. The value of your aETHb however is unlikely to rise above that of ETH over time.

become-provider.api-text: Integrate Ankr's Eth2 staking protocol with exchanges, wallets and custodian services.
become-provider.governance-text: Participate in governance and be a part of the future of the platform!
become-provider.knowledge-text: Run Ethereum 2.0 nodes on Ankr, no hardware or technical knowledge required.
become-provider.text: Become a provider by running Ethereum 2.0 nodes on Ankr with no hardware or technical knowledge required.

faq.answer-1: Yes! To democratize access to Ethereum 2.0 for users who are unable to invest 32 ETH (the fixed amount required by the network), Ankr staking introduces Micropools – a proprietary solution that enables you to start staking with as little as 0.5 ETH. Simply choose the amount you want to delegate, and the system will automatically assign it to the best providers.
faq.answer-10: Yes! If you own enough ANKR tokens, you can participate in governance and vote on key parameters to define the future of the platform.
faq.answer-2: The Micropools mechanism is our unique solution for breaking down the economic barriers for Ethereum 2.0 staking. As the name implies, Micropools allow users to chip in smaller portions of ETH towards a Validator, and receive a proportionate reward based on their contribution.
faq.answer-3: Ankr's liquid staking protocol allows ETH holders to participate in Ethereum 2.0 staking and earn staking rewards, without running a node and locking your ETH for an unknown period of time.
faq.answer-4: Ankr effectively tackles the illiquidity issue of Ethereum 2.0 by introducing aETHc which will enable you to trade your stake or utilize it in DeFi protocols to earn yield at any point in time.
faq.answer-5:
Until transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0 you can simply trade your aETHc for ETH. 1 aETHc should become worth more than 1 ETH over time.

As soon as Ethereum 2.0 transactions are enabled, you can use your aETHc to redeem your ETH stake plus your staking rewards.
faq.answer-6: aETHc is a synthetic derivative asset which represents your ETH stake plus earned staking rewards. When you stake your ETH with Ankr, you can redeem aETHc tokens, which you can choose to keep in self custody, trade or use in DeFi products to earn yield.
faq.answer-7: Despite that Ethereum 2.0 only enables you to stake multiples of 32 ETH, with Ankr you can stake all your tokens at once, without having to allocate them to multiple nodes. This means you can even stake 1,000 ETH or more in just one click!
faq.answer-8: Yes! You can become a provider and run your own node to collect staking rewards. If you don’t have any hardware or technical knowledge to set up a node, you can always use Ankr and deploy your Ethereum 2.0 node in one click.
faq.answer-9: To become a node provider and earn platform fees, you need to set up an Ethereum 2.0 node with a minimum “insurance” stake of 2 ETH to compensate users in case of slashing events.
faq.question-1: Can I stake if I have less than 32 ETH?
faq.question-10: Can I use my ANKR tokens on the platform?
faq.question-4: How will my stake become liquid if I stake them before transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0?
faq.question-5: How can I redeem my staked ETH and staking rewards?
faq.question-7: I have more than 32 ETH. Can I still stake with Ankr?
faq.question-8: Can I run my own Ethereum 2.0 node on Ankr?
faq.question-9: What do I need to become a node provider on the platform?
faq.title: FAQ

features.liquidity-text: With aETHc, you can hold or trade your staked assets at any time, without having to wait until transactions are enabled on Ethereum 2.0.
features.manager-text: Send all of your ETH in one transaction and the protocol will automatically allocate your funds to the best pools.
features.micropool-text: Stake as little as 0.5 ETH and pool with other stakers while enjoy the same ROI.
features.security-text: Keep your funds under your own custody, to always remain in full control of your assets.
features.text: Ankr's Eth2 staking solution provides the best user experience and highest level of safety, combined with an attractive reward mechanism and instant staking liquidity through a bond-like synthetic token called aETHc.
features.title: Why stake with Ankr?

item.1: To  participate  in  a  proposal,  users  must  give  allowance  to  Ankr StakeFi’s  AnkrDepositContract.
item.2: Every deposited ANKR token has only one voting power (i.e., more tokens morevote power).
item.3: Users can deposit tokens before the voting period or while they vote.
item.4: Users can participate multiple proposals by voting with the same deposited tokens(as long as the address has sufficient ANKR tokens).
item.5: The voting power is equal to their deposit amount.

item.1: Once the proposal is created, it will be available for voting.
item.2: The creator’s {value, number} ANKR will be locked for 2 weeks.
item.3: The creator will not be able to create another proposal with same locked tokens. However, he/she can still vote for other proposals.
item.4: An address can create at most 2 proposals in a month.
item.5: Once the voting period is ended, if the proposal has been accepted with a majority vote, then the proposal will be implemented by the Ankr team in the following 15 up to 30 days.

staker-dashboard.locked: Any staked amounts will be locked for the duration of the ETH 2.0 contract. You will, however, receive aETHc equivalent to your stake that you will be able to trade in the meantime, against your staked amount. Until aETHc is made available, however, your funds will be locked and not redeemable.

switch-network-notification.notice: The entire staking process for Pegged-ETH token on BSC (Binance Smart Chain) network takes a bit longer than Ethereum. To maximize the security of your fund, we will enable the aETHc claim function on BSC around 02/22/2021 - 02/24/2021 UTC while closely watch the BSC staking process. Thank you.

top-up.deposit-ankr-placeholder: Instances of our Ankr provider node have reached capacity so new providers are not currently required. Deposits are therefore paused.
top-up.deposit-eth-placeholder: Instances of our Ankr provider node have reached capacity so new providers are not currently required.
top-up.deposit-tip: Instances of our Ankr provider node have reached capacity so new providers are not currently required. Continue here only if you need to top-up your deposit in order for your existing node running.
top-up.deposit-agreement: I understand and wish to continue anyway
top-up.eth-top-up-note:
Please note that if your insurance ever drops below 2 ETH due to slashing penalties, your node may stop running. To prevent this from happening, or to restart a node that has stopped because of this, please ensure your remaining insurance balance is at least 2 ETH. You can top this amount up here.

Also note that once deposited, any insurance amount remains locked in the Stkr system until the contract ends (Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1.5 release).
top-up.title: Insurance deposit

stake-eth.1: Stake any amount of ETH (minimum 0.5 ETH) to earn staking rewards.
stake-eth.2: Keep your staked ETH liquid to trade, sell or participate in DeFi applications through aETHc.

stake-bnb.1: Stake any amount of BNB (minimum 1 BNB) to earn staking rewards.
stake-bnb.2: The rewards will be distributed right to the wallet.
stake-bnb.3: Staking BNB directly contributes to the security of the entire network.

provider.1: Run Ethereum 2.0 nodes and earn from staking rewards and platform fees.
provider.2: Stake additional Ankr in your node to obtain a higher trust-level and have your micropools prioritized as well as earning more rewards!
provider.3: Use the Ankr platform to host your nodes, to remove all technical and operational barriers, and avoid any slashing charges!

stake-avax.1: Stake any amount of AVAX and claim AVAX bond (aAVAXb) while earning staking rewards.
stake-avax.2: Connect your staking rewards to DeFi, and trade, sell or participate in DeFi applications using aAVAXb reward earning bond.
stake-avax.3: Unstake/redeem your aAVAXb and receive the equivalent amount of AVAX in maximum 14 days.

stake-ksm.1: Stake any amount of KSM (minimum 1 KSM) to earn staking rewards.
stake-ksm.2: Keep your KSM liquid to trade, sell, or participate in DeFi applications through aKSMb.
stake-ksm.4: Unstake/unbond KSM by redeeming aKSMb and get back the fair value of KSM in 7 days.
